p: Leaves of Croton specimens were collected in the Butuguara Private Natural Heritage Reserve (RPPN) in the municipality of Palmeira, PR, located at 25°20.884′ S and 49°47.258′ W. This region has altitudes ranging from 985 to 1145 m, with predominantly Litossol and Cambisol soils [ 25]. According to the Köppen classification, the climate is Cfb type, temperate, with mild summer, annual average temperatures of 17 °C, severe and frequent frosts, and an average rainfall of 1200 mm per year.
